data.lyric:
[ti:Sigue]
[ar:J Balvin/Ed Sheeran]
[al:Sigue/Forever My Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sigue - J Balvin (J·巴拉文)/Ed Sheeran (艾德·希兰)
[00:00.31]Lyrics by：J Balvin/Ed Sheeran/Tainy/Justin Quiles/Keytin
[00:00.62]Composed by：J Balvin/Ed Sheeran/Tainy/Justin Quiles/Keytin
[00:00.93]Dale
[00:01.62]Sigue
[00:02.40]
[00:03.90]Que a mí me gusta todo lo que exhibes
[00:07.76]
[00:09.46]Yo puedo tocar los temas
[00:12.05]Que miren cómo te recorro el cuerpo entero
[00:15.72]
[00:16.31]Bebé tú solo sigue
[00:18.52]
[00:20.33]Tú eres sola pa' mí
[00:22.01]Yeah
[00:22.37]
[00:22.92]Yo quiero darte tu regalo ante' de Navidad
[00:25.10]
[00:25.83]Tu mentalidad e' mi debilidad
[00:28.33]Llama a tu amiga pa' que hagamos una trinidad
[00:30.88]Si tú eres sólida te pongo líquida
[00:33.44]
[00:34.38]Esta noche tú y yo sí nos vamo' a joder
[00:36.73]Sí nos vamo' a joder sí nos vamo' a joder
[00:39.60]Yo estoy puesto dime si estás puesta pa' beber
[00:42.24]Si estás puesta pa' beber si estás puesta pa' beber
[00:44.78]Mami si me sigues nos vamos pa'l hotel
[00:46.83]
[00:47.34]Tú ere' la primera pa' ti no hay un top ten
[00:49.79]And I'm rollin' with a couple of people I know well
[00:52.51]Know I can keep a secret you know that I won't tell
[00:55.16]Tu blanquito pelirrojo rojo
[00:57.91]Los que te tiran son flojos flojos
[01:00.56]Hace rato tengo antojo de ti
[01:02.52]Ten cuidado de mí si te cojo cojo
[01:05.79]
[01:06.95]Sigue
[01:07.80]
[01:09.43]Que a mí me gusta todo lo que exhibes
[01:13.08]
[01:14.88]Yo puedo tocar los temas
[01:17.46]Que miren cómo te recorro el cuerpo entero
[01:21.11]
[01:21.86]Bebé tú solo sigue
[01:23.99]
[01:25.75]Tú eres sola pa' mí
[01:27.71]
[01:28.60]Dime Tainy si están puestas pa'l perreo
[01:30.56]
[01:31.15]Pa'l guayeteo pa'l sobeteo
[01:33.40]
[01:34.02]En la disco sabe' la rompemo' feo
[01:36.44]Y si te veo te bellaqueo
[01:39.20]Tú no te imaginas lo que tengo pa' ti
[01:41.71]Después de dos tragos nos ponemos fácil
[01:44.30]I'ma grab a couple bottles and fill up a glass each
[01:47.02]You keep dancin' to the rhythm this beat's to your heartbeat
[01:49.68]Tu blanquito pelirrojo rojo
[01:52.44]Los que te tiran son flojos flojos
[01:55.13]Hace rato tengo antojo de ti
[01:57.14]Ten cuidado de mí si te cojo cojo
[02:00.40]
[02:01.54]Sigue
[02:02.32]
[02:03.82]Que a mí me gusta todo lo que exhibes
[02:07.72]
[02:09.31]Yo puedo tocar los temas
[02:12.06]Que miren cómo te recorro el cuerpo entero
[02:15.69]
[02:16.31]Baby tú solo sigue
[02:18.57]
[02:20.35]Tú eres sola pa' mí
[02:22.17]
[02:23.15]Dime Tainy si están puestas pa'l perreo
[02:25.02]
[02:25.55]Pa'l guayeteo pa'l sobeteo
[02:27.83]

[02:30.60]

data.trans:
[ti:继续]
[ar:J Balvin/Ed Sheeran]
[al:继续/Forever My Love]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.31]//
[00:00.62]//
[00:00.93]来吧
[00:01.62]继续
[00:02.40]
[00:03.90]我喜欢你尽情施展你的魅力
[00:07.76]
[00:09.46]我演唱歌曲
[00:12.05]让他们都明白我对你有多着迷
[00:15.72]
[00:16.31]宝贝 继续吧
[00:18.52]
[00:20.33]你独属于我
[00:22.01]//
[00:22.37]
[00:22.92]圣诞节还未到来 我就想把礼物送给你
[00:25.10]
[00:25.83]我的弱点就是无法不去在意你的想法
[00:28.33]打电话给你朋友 我们可以一起嗨
[00:30.88]若你的心坚硬如铁 难以动摇 我也能让你温柔如水
[00:33.44]
[00:34.38]今晚我们要尽情缠绵 肆意放纵
[00:36.73]是的 今晚我们要尽情缠绵 肆意放纵
[00:39.60]如果你想举杯买醉 就告诉我 我准备好了
[00:42.24]如果你想醉饮一番 如果你想举杯买醉
[00:44.78]亲爱的 跟我来 我们一起去酒店
[00:46.83]
[00:47.34]你就是我心里谁也无法取代的No.1 绝不是前十
[00:49.79]跟几个很熟的朋友一起玩闹
[00:52.51]你清楚我会保守秘密 绝不会泄露出去
[00:55.16]白肤红发的你 人群中异常耀眼
[00:57.91]抛弃你的人都是笨蛋
[01:00.56]要知道我垂涎你已久
[01:02.52]万一被我逮到 你可要当心
[01:05.79]
[01:06.95]继续
[01:07.80]
[01:09.43]我喜欢你尽情施展你的魅力
[01:13.08]
[01:14.88]我演唱歌曲
[01:17.46]让他们都明白我对你有多着迷
[01:21.11]
[01:21.86]宝贝 继续吧
[01:23.99]
[01:25.75]你独属于我
[01:27.71]
[01:28.60]告诉我 Tainy 大家都做好准备热舞了吗
[01:30.56]
[01:31.15]我爱你 深爱你
[01:33.40]
[01:34.02]舞池里 他知道我们会打破所有桎梏
[01:36.44]如果我看到你 我会对你浮想联翩
[01:39.20]你肯定无法想象我会给你带来什么
[01:41.71]两杯酒下肚 我们惬意无比
[01:44.30]我去拿几瓶酒 每人都倒一杯
[01:47.02]你一直跟着自己的心跳节奏舞动
[01:49.68]白肤红发的你 人群中异常耀眼
[01:52.44]抛弃你的人都是笨蛋
[01:55.13]我垂涎你已久
[01:57.14]万一被我逮到 你可要当心
[02:00.40]
[02:01.54]继续
[02:02.32]
[02:03.82]我喜欢你尽情施展你的魅力
[02:07.72]
[02:09.31]我演唱歌曲
[02:12.06]让他们都明白我对你有多着迷
[02:15.69]
[02:16.31]亲爱的 请你继续
[02:18.57]
[02:20.35]你独属于我
[02:22.17]
[02:23.15]告诉我 Tainy 大家都做好准备热舞了吗
[02:25.02]
[02:25.55]放纵自我 激情共舞
[02:27.83]
[02:28.48]舞池里 你知道我们会打破所有桎梏
[02:30.60]
[02:31.18]如果我看到你 我会对你浮想联翩
